Name: Hero of Light VR: Episode 1
About the game: 'Hero of Light VR' is an action VR game with an eastern fantasy background. The ancient continent in the Eastern realms are experiencing a holocaust. Priests of an occult order have breathed life into ancient demons, summoning them into calamitous destruction across the lands. There remain only a few with the will and skill to meet this gathering threat “the Guardians”. You, are one of the few that remain as a source for hope in these increasingly decimated times, a warrior sect with the ability and conscience to prevent complete, ruinous disaster. The spells of thunder, fire sword and enchanted blade … these armaments combined with your martial skill just may give us a chance to face this threat. When the great evil appears before you, do not retreat. The light of the Buddha will enchant you, empowering you against the darkness. The World Of Legend VR: Episode 1 Includes： 3 Types Of Weapons to Use In Battle. tutorial Section 1 map level with multiple enemy types and a boss. Global leaderboards ranking players according to their in-game performance.
